miwin.name: Miwin Dice
miwin.info:
Miwin's dice are a set of nontransitive dice invented in 1975 by the physicist Michael Winkelmann. They consist of three different dice with faces bearing numbers from one to nine; opposite faces sum to nine, ten or eleven. The numbers on each die give the sum of 30 and have an arithmetic mean of five.

Details on Wikipedia.
miwin.info_zh:
Miwin 骰子是由物理学家 Michael Winkelmann 于 1975 年发明的一组非传递骰子。它们由三个不同的骰子组成，面上带有从一到九的数字；对面之和为九、十或十一。每个骰子上的数字总和为30，算术平均值为5。

详情请见维基百科

tooltips.A-B: Die A beats Die B about 47.2% of the time
tooltips.A-C: Die A beats Die C about 44.4% of the time
tooltips.B-A: Die B beats Die A about 44.4% of the time
tooltips.B-C: Die B beats Die C about 47.2% of the time
tooltips.C-A: Die C beats Die A about 47.2% of the time
tooltips.C-B: Die C beats Die B about 44.4% of the time
